metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for interoperability between coding agents like Claude Code and Codex CLI

plugins.name: interpeer
plugins.description: Get a second opinion in the form of expert feedback from OpenAI Codex CLI on designs, implementations, or approaches, then review and discuss that feedback with the user

plugins.name: interdoc
plugins.description: Automatic, ambient CLAUDE.md maintenance - detects changes when you start a session and proactively suggests documentation updates without manual invocation
